services.name: Deep Drivetrain Clean/Tune
includes: clean chain
clean cassette
clean crankset
clean derailleurs
tune the shifting

services.name: Suspension Overhaul
services.cost: $75 to $175 for fork or rear shock/each
includes: disassemble the suspecion fork and reak shock
clean the internals
reinstall with new clean oil
check for wear on bushings and seals

services.name: Bottom Bracket Overhaul
includes: disassemble the bottom bracket
clean and regrease (or replace for extra) bearings
clean the shell and cups or press-fit insert
reinstall the entire setup
inspect for bearing wear and creaks

services.name: True Wheels
includes: each wheel gets put in the truing stand
spoke tension is tuned for true (side-to-side wobbles)
tune round (vertical hops)
tune dish (alignment of the rim on the hub so itâ€™s in the center of the bike frame)
stressed spokes or spoke nipples get replaced, which may cost extra

services.name: Bleed Disc Brakes
includes: front and rear hydraulic brakes are flushed with fresh brake fluid
pistons are cleaned
pads inspected for wear and replaced if necessary (extra cost for new pads)
